That's a great idea! Sharing your personal experience with the hashtag #fitnessmotivation can help inspire and motivate your followers to use it too. By sharing your success story, you're showing them that it's possible to grow their audience and connect with like-minded people by using a specific hashtag.

By mentioning the specific number of new followers you've gained (25) and the timeframe (6 weeks), you're providing a tangible example of the impact that using the hashtag has had on your account. This can help your followers understand the potential benefits of using the hashtag and motivate them to start using it too.

Additionally, by highlighting the engagement and reach you've seen on Instagram, you're showing your followers that using the hashtag can lead to more than just new followers - it can also lead to more likes, comments, and shares on your posts.

Remember to keep your tone enthusiastic and encouraging, and to invite your followers to share their own experiences with the hashtag. You could say something like:

"Hey everyone! I wanted to share a quick update with you all. I started using the hashtag #fitnessmotivation about 6 weeks ago, and I've been blown away by the response. Since then, I've gained 25 new followers who are all passionate about fitness and healthy living. It's been amazing to connect with like-minded people and see how it's helped my engagement and reach on Instagram. If you're not already using the hashtag, I highly recommend giving it a try. Let's connect and support each other on our fitness journeys! #fitnessmotivation"

Good luck with your Q&A session, and I hope your followers find your story inspiring!
